name: Not My Problem!
description:
Controls:

WASD, ZQSD, arrow keys - move

Spacebar - jump, start game (title screen)

Pick up the princess by facing her from the front

This is my entry for Hiddel's NES jam, the theme being "reverse". In this game you play as a knock-off certain evil turtle who has decided that kidnapping princesses is more trouble than it's worth, and is trying to return her to the local red plumber. Unfortunately she is very distraught and doesn't realize that you've reached this conclusion, so you're going to have a heck of a time trying to get her there safely. Good luck!

This game was coded in Smalltalk using Pharo and the GodotTalk virtual machine!

Music credits: 8 Bit Arcade by HeatleyBros
